purpose.to_describe: the metadata and form of a NetCDF-format file

abbrev_widget_len.description: an arbitrary example of a data variable

xxxxx_Group_Attributes.group: can omit/empty, xxxxx is group name

detector_ID.description: unique integer identifier for each TIRS detector

detector_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about each TIRS channel/scene combination
detector_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] detector masked, [b1] extreme noise or unresponsive detector, [b2] greater-noise category, [b3] unreliable calibration due to stray light contribution, [b4] unreliable calibration due to thermal effects, [b5] unreliable calibration due to filter-edge effects

wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, given by the SRF-weighted mean over wavelength

idealized_wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, in the idealized spectrometer grid

spectral_radiance_unc.description: uncertainty of the calibrated spectral radiance values (channels 1-63)

observation_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about special circumstances of the overall radiance observation at each frame
observation_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] thermal transient after payload-on-but-safed period (e.g., during/near downlink contacts and GPS zenith pointing), [b1] small thermal/radiometric perturbation present (e.g., near eclipse exit), [b2] large thermal/radiometric perturbation present (e.g., near eclipse entrance), [b3] greater-than-normal temperature change within this orbit (during the thermal transient after powering instrument back on), [b4] moderate time interval between observation and the nearest calibration sequence (due to corrupted or missing calibration sequence(s)), [b5] large time interval between observation and the nearest calibration sequence (due to corrupted or missing calibration sequence(s)), [b6] bus telemetry indicates that spacecraft attitude determination is invalid, [b7] lack of spacecraft attitude information due to a bus telemetry gap, [b8] during an unknown type of bus slew, [b9] during a modeled-sun-avoidance type of bus slew, [b10] electronics warm-up period after powering instrument on

calibration_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about special circumstances of the calibration calculation at each frame, spectral channel, and scene
calibration_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] invalid calibration, [b1] calibration not attempted (e.g., masked detector)

radiance_quality_flag.description: overall spectral radiance quality flag, representing the combination of detector, observation, and calibration quality flags

detector_quality_flag.description: quality flag describing characteristics of detectors (i.e., spectral channels) for each scene

calibration_quality_flag.description: flag describing the calibration calculation quality at each frame, spectral channel, and scene

spectral_BT.description: the calibrated, spectrally-resolved TIRS brightness temperature (channels 1-63)

spectral_BT_unc.description: uncertainty of the calibrated spectral brightness temperature values (channels 1-63)

BT_quality_flag.description: overall brightness temperature quality flag, representing the combination of relevant detector, observation, and radiance quality flags

channel_0_radiance.description: total spectrally integrated radiance from direct-illuminated TIRS channel 0

channel_0_radiance_unc.description: uncertainty of the total spectrally integrated radiance from direct-illuminated TIRS channel 0

channel_0_detector_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about TIRS channel 0 for each scene
channel_0_detector_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] detector masked, [b1] extreme noise or unresponsive detector, [b2] greater-noise category, [b3] unreliable calibration due to stray light contribution, [b4] unreliable calibration due to thermal effects, [b5] unreliable calibration due to filter-edge effects

channel_0_detector_quality_flag.description: quality flag describing characteristics of channel 0 detectors

channel_0_radiance_quality_flag.description: overall spectral radiance quality flag, representing the combination of any detector, observation, and radiance quality flags for channel 0

detector_ID.description: unique integer identifier for each TIRS detector

detector_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about each TIRS channel/scene combination
detector_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] detector masked, [b1] extreme noise or unresponsive detector, [b2] greater-noise category, [b3] unreliable calibration due to stray light contribution, [b4] unreliable calibration due to thermal effects, [b5] unreliable calibration due to filter-edge effects

wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, given by the SRF-weighted mean over wavelength

idealized_wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, in the idealized spectrometer grid

spectral_radiance_unc.description: uncertainty of the calibrated spectral radiance values (channels 1-63)

observation_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about special circumstances of the overall radiance observation at each frame
observation_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] thermal transient after payload-on-but-safed period (e.g., during/near downlink contacts and GPS zenith pointing), [b1] small thermal/radiometric perturbation present (e.g., near eclipse exit), [b2] large thermal/radiometric perturbation present (e.g., near eclipse entrance), [b3] greater-than-normal temperature change within this orbit (during the thermal transient after powering instrument back on), [b4] moderate time interval between observation and the nearest calibration sequence (due to corrupted or missing calibration sequence(s)), [b5] large time interval between observation and the nearest calibration sequence (due to corrupted or missing calibration sequence(s)), [b6] bus telemetry indicates that spacecraft attitude determination is invalid, [b7] lack of spacecraft attitude information due to a bus telemetry gap, [b8] during an unknown type of bus slew, [b9] during a modeled-sun-avoidance type of bus slew, [b10] electronics warm-up period after powering instrument on

calibration_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about special circumstances of the calibration calculation at each frame, spectral channel, and scene
calibration_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] invalid calibration, [b1] calibration not attempted (e.g., masked detector)

radiance_quality_flag.description: overall spectral radiance quality flag, representing the combination of detector, observation, and calibration quality flags

detector_quality_flag.description: quality flag describing characteristics of detectors (i.e., spectral channels) for each scene

calibration_quality_flag.description: flag describing the calibration calculation quality at each frame, spectral channel, and scene

spectral_BT.description: the calibrated, spectrally-resolved TIRS brightness temperature (channels 1-63)

spectral_BT_unc.description: uncertainty of the calibrated spectral brightness temperature values (channels 1-63)

BT_quality_flag.description: overall brightness temperature quality flag, representing the combination of relevant detector, observation, and radiance quality flags

channel_0_radiance.description: total spectrally integrated radiance from direct-illuminated TIRS channel 0

channel_0_radiance_unc.description: uncertainty of the total spectrally integrated radiance from direct-illuminated TIRS channel 0

channel_0_detector_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about TIRS channel 0 for each scene
channel_0_detector_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] detector masked, [b1] extreme noise or unresponsive detector, [b2] greater-noise category, [b3] unreliable calibration due to stray light contribution, [b4] unreliable calibration due to thermal effects, [b5] unreliable calibration due to filter-edge effects

channel_0_detector_quality_flag.description: quality flag describing characteristics of channel 0 detectors

channel_0_radiance_quality_flag.description: overall spectral radiance quality flag, representing the combination of any detector, observation, and radiance quality flags for channel 0

elevation_correction.description: difference between L1B surface topographic elevation and interpolated surface elevation from gridded meteorological analysis dataset

below_surface_flag.description: flag for PCRTM pressure levels that are below the surface elevation for this FOV

land_surface_temp.description: land surface temperature, including snow (populated only for FOVs where met analysis land fraction > 0)

skin_temp.description: surface skin temperature (available over all surfaces)

temp_2m.description: air temperature at 2 meters above the displacement height

temp_10m.description: air temperature at 10 meters above the displacement height

land_fraction.description: land fraction (land area / total area) from met analysis

seaice_concentration.description: fractional sea ice concentration (sea ice area / total water area) ranging from 0 to 1

snow_cover.description: fractional snow cover (snow-covered land area / total land area), populated only for FOVs where met analysis land fraction > 0

altitude_profile.description: vertical profile of altitude (geopotential height) above the ground surface

u_profile.description: vertical profile of eastward wind component

v_profile.description: vertical profile of northward wind component

omega_profile.description: vertical profile of vertical pressure velocity

u_10m.description: eastward wind component at 10 m above the displacement height

v_10m.description: northward wind component at 10 m above the displacement height

xco2.description: carbon dioxide concentration from CAMS EGG4 global greenhouse gas reanalysis climatology

xch4.description: methane concentration from CAMS EGG4 global greenhouse gas reanalysis climatology

VIIRS_surface_type.description: count of VIIRS pixels per IGBP surface class within this TIRS FOV (dimension n_igbp_classes is indexed in the same order as the 17 IGBP surface classes, e.g., the first index of that dimension references the count of VIIRS pixels of IGBP class 1), from the VIIRS annual blended surface type product
VIIRS_surface_type.IGBP_classes: [1] evergreen needleleaf forests, [2] evergreen broadleaf forests, [3] deciduous needleleaf forests, [4] deciduous broadleaf forests, [5] mixed forests, [6] closed shrublands, [7] open shrublands, [8] woody savannas, [9] savannas, [10] grasslands, [11] permanent wetlands, [12] croplands, [13] urban and built-up lands, [14] cropland/natural vegetation mosaics, [15] snow and ice, [16] barren, [17] water bodies

antarctic_land_fraction.description: land area fraction (land area / land + water + ice_shelf area) from BAS medium-resolution Antarctic coastlines dataset (populated only for FOVs < 60S latitude)

antarctic_ice_shelf_fraction.description: fractional ice shelf area (ice_shelf area / land + water + ice_shelf area) from BAS medium-resolution Antarctic coastlines dataset (populated only for FOVs < 60S latitude)

merged_surface_type_prelim.description: preliminary merged surface type using coastline data plus met analysis sea ice and snow cover data
merged_surface_type_prelim.flag_meanings: [1] open water, [2] sea ice, [3] partial sea ice, [4] permanent land ice, [5] Antarctic ice shelf, [6] snow-covered land, [7] partial snow-covered land, [8] snow-free land

merged_land_fraction_prelim_data_source.long_name: merged land fraction (for preliminary surface type) data source
merged_land_fraction_prelim_data_source.description: land fraction data source used to determine preliminary merged surface type
merged_land_fraction_prelim_data_source.flag_meanings: [1] Copernicus GLO-90 DEM, [2] British Antarctic Survey medium-resolution Antarctic coastlines, [7] GEOS-IT

merged_seaice_prelim_data_source.long_name: merged sea ice (for preliminary surface type) data source
merged_seaice_prelim_data_source.description: sea ice data source used to determine preliminary merged surface type

merged_snow_prelim_data_source.long_name: snow cover (for preliminary surface type) data source
merged_snow_prelim_data_source.description: snow cover data source used to determine preliminary merged surface type

sea_ice_category_values.value: (sea ice fraction >= 0.95: sea ice), (0.05 <= sea ice fraction < 0.95: partial sea ice), (sea ice fraction < 0.05: open water)

snow_cover_category_values.value: (snow cover >= 0.5: snow-covered land), (0.01 < snow cover < 0.5: partial snow-covered land), (snow cover <= 0.01: snow-free land)

VIIRS_L3_num_pts_total.long_name: VIIRS L3 CMG number of points
VIIRS_L3_num_pts_total.description: number of VIIRS L3 CMG points within TIRS FOV, including masked points

VIIRS_L3_snow_fraction_num_pts_used.long_name: VIIRS L3 CMG snow fraction number of points used
VIIRS_L3_snow_fraction_num_pts_used.description: number of VIIRS L3 CMG points within TIRS FOV used to calculate snow fraction, after cloud- and quality-flag masking applied

VIIRS_L3_snow_fraction_mean.description: mean snow fraction across all VIIRS L3 CMG points within TIRS FOV, after cloud- and quality-flag masking applied

VIIRS_L3_snow_fraction_stdev.description: standard deviation of snow fraction across all VIIRS L3 CMG points within TIRS FOV, after cloud- and quality-flag masking applied

VIIRS_L3_cloud_fraction_num_pts_used.long_name: VIIRS L3 CMG cloud fraction number of points used
VIIRS_L3_cloud_fraction_num_pts_used.description: number of VIIRS L3 CMG points within TIRS FOV used to calculate cloud fraction, after quality-flag masking applied

VIIRS_L3_cloud_fraction_mean.description: mean cloud fraction across all VIIRS L3 CMG points within TIRS FOV, after quality-flag masking applied

VIIRS_L3_cloud_fraction_stdev.description: standard deviation of cloud fraction across all VIIRS L3 CMG points within TIRS FOV, after quality-flag masking applied

AMSR_L3_seaice_concentration.description: AMSR L3 sea ice concentration, bilinearly interpolated to TIRS FOV, expressed as a fraction (sea ice area / total water area) ranging from 0 to 1

NISE_L3_snow_fraction.description: NISE L3 snow cover, bilinearly interpolated to TIRS FOV, expressed as a fraction ranging from 0 to 1. Fraction results from interpolation of binary source data values ([0] snow-free land, [1] snow-covered land)

NISE_L3_seaice_concentration.description: NISE L3 sea ice concentration, bilinearly interpolated to TIRS FOV, expressed as a fraction (sea ice area / total water area) ranging from 0 to 1

merged_surface_type_final.description: final merged surface type using met analysis and satellite sea ice and snow cover data
merged_surface_type_final.flag_meanings: [1] open water, [2] sea ice, [3] partial sea ice, [4] permanent land ice, [5] Antarctic ice shelf, [6] snow-covered land, [7] partial snow-covered land, [8] snow-free land

merged_seaice_final_data_source.long_name: merged surface type sea ice (final) data source
merged_seaice_final_data_source.description: sea ice data source used to determine final merged surface type

merged_snow_final_data_source.long_name: merged surface type snow cover (final) data source
merged_snow_final_data_source.description: snow cover data source used to determine final merged surface type
merged_snow_final_data_source.flag_meanings: [0] None, [3] NOAA20 VIIRS L3, [4] SNPP VIIRS L3, [6] NISE, [7] GEOS-IT

cloud_mask.flag_meanings: [0] clear, [1] likely clear, [2] uncertain, [3] likely cloud, [4] cloud; (see the 2B-MSK Data User Guide for category details)

cldmask_probability.description: cloud probability, a continuous fractional value in the range [0-1]

msk_quality_flag.description: flag specifying the overall quality of the cloud mask determination(s) for each FOV

msk_qc_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain additional boolean info about the quality of the cloud mask determinations and fields
msk_qc_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] based on best-quality radiances, [b1] based on uncategorized radiances, [b2] cloud mask determination not attempted due to radiance_quality_flag value

wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, given by the SRF-weighted mean over wavelength

idealized_wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, in the idealized spectrometer grid

sfc_spectral_emis.description: surface spectral emissivity for each FOV and spectral channel

OE_iterations.description: number of iterations used in optimal estimation algorithm

sfc_quality_flag.description: flag specifying the overall quality of the surface emissivity determination(s) for each FOV
sfc_quality_flag.flag_meanings: [0] nominal (all emissivities <= 1), [1] nominal (some reported emissivity values > 1 and <= 1.1, see uncertainties)

sfc_qc_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain additional boolean info about the quality of the surface emissivity determinations and fields
sfc_qc_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] retrieval not attempted due to geographic constraints (e.g., latitude), [b1] retrieval not attempted due to radiance_quality_flag value, [b2] retrieval not attempted due to cloud mask (e.g., not clear enough), [b3] negative convergence criterion at last iteration, [b4] zero degrees of freedom at last iteration, [b5] emissivity value in one or two channels is greater than max threshold, [b6] emissivity value in 3 or more channels is greater than max threshold, [b7] emissivity value in one or two channels is less than min threshold, [b8] emissivity value in 3 or more channels is less than min threshold, [b9] emissivity value in one or more channels is greater than unity, [10] retrieval where cldmask_probability < 0.1

wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, given by the SRF-weighted mean over wavelength

idealized_wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, in the idealized spectrometer grid

olr.description: outgoing longwave radiation (broadband longwave flux at the top of the atmosphere)

spectral_flux.description: top-of-atmosphere spectral flux within each TIRS channel

spectral_flux_unc.description: uncertainty of top-of-atmosphere spectral flux within each TIRS channel

flx_quality_flag.description: flag specifying the overall quality of the flux determination(s) for each FOV

flx_qc_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain additional boolean info about the quality of the flux determinations and fields
flx_qc_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] calculation not attempted due to geographic constraints (e.g., latitude), [b1] calculation not attempted due to radiance_quality_flag (1B-RAD) value, [b2] calculation not attempted due to missing cloud mask (2B-MSK) value, [b3] calculation not attempted due to cld_quality_flag (2B-CLD) value, [b4] calculation not attempted due to cloud properties (2B-CLD) values outside the usable range, [b5] calculation uses cld_quality_flag > 1

cwv_prior.description: column water vapor computed by integrating the prior mean water vapor profile

cwv.description: column water vapor computed by integrating the retrieved water vapor profile

cwv_unc.description: posterior 1-sigma uncertainty of the retrieval propagated through the column water vapor integral

T_profile_prior.description: prior temperature profile for optimal estimation algorithm

T_profile.description: retrieved temperature profile from optimal estimation algorithm

T_profile_unc.description: 1-sigma uncertainty of retrieved temperature profile from optimal estimation posterior covariance

wv_profile_prior.description: prior water vapor specific humidity profile for optimal estimation algorithm

wv_profile.description: retrieved water wapor specific humidity profile from optimal estimation algorithm

wv_profile_log_unc.description: 1-sigma uncertainty of logarithm of specific humidity water vapor profile from optimal estimation posterior covariance

wv_profile_unc.description: 1-sigma uncertainty of specific humidity water vapor profile from optimal estimation posterior covariance

surface_T_prior.description: prior surface temperature for optimal estimation algorithm

surface_T.description: retrieved surface temperature from optimal estimation algorithm

surface_T_unc.description: 1-sigma uncertainty of surface temperature from optimal estimation algorithm

surface_pressure.description: surface pressure, which also sets the lowest pressure level in the vertical level grid

pressure_profile.description: pressure values on coarse output level grid

altitude_profile.description: altitude values on coarse output level grid

emissivity_prior.description: spectral emissivity at TIRS channels, used for forward model calculations but not retrieved

posterior_covariance.description: posterior covariance from optimal estimation algorithm

averaging_kernel_matrix.description: averaging kernel matrix from optimal estimation algorithm

reduced_chi_squared_at_start.description: reduced chi squared statistic at the prior mean state

reduced_chi_squared.description: reduced chi squared statistic at the retrieved state

iterations.description: number of iterations used in optimal estimation algorithm

diverging_steps.description: number of diverging steps (increases in the cost function) made during iteration

atm_quality_flag.description: flag specifying the overall quality of the retrieval for each FOV
atm_quality_flag.flag_meanings: [0] good retrieval, [1] retrieval converged but did not meet quality check, [2] retrieval did not converge

atm_qc_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain additional boolean info about the quality of the atmospheric profile and surface temperature determinations and fields
atm_qc_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] reduced chi^2 is over threshold, [b1] retrieval exceeded iteration limit, [b2] retrieval exceeded divergence limit, [b3] retrieval went out of range, [b4] retrieval solver crashed, [b5] retrieval used constant surface emissivity, [b10] retrieval not attempted due to cloud mask, [b11] retrieval not attempted due to latitude constraint, [b12] retrieval not attempted due to 1B-RAD status

cloudtop_pressure.description: retrieved air pressure at cloud-top from the optimal estimation algorithm

cloudtop_pressure_unc.description: 1-sigma uncertainty of the retrieved cloud-top pressure from optimal estimation posterior covariance

cloudtop_pressure_prior.description: cloud-top pressure prior for optimal estimation algorithm

cloud_tau.description: retrieved cloud optical depth from the optimal estimation algorithm

cloud_tau_unc.description: 1-sigma uncertainty of the retrieved cloud optical depth from optimal estimation posterior covariance

cloud_tau_prior.description: cloud optical depth prior for optimal estimation algorithm

cloud_d_eff.description: retrieved effective cloud-particle diameter from the optimal estimation algorithm

cloud_d_eff_unc.description: 1-sigma uncertainty of the retrieved effective cloud-particle diameter from optimal estimation posterior covariance

cloud_d_eff_prior.description: effective cloud-particle diameter prior for optimal estimation algorithm

posterior_covariance.description: posterior covariance from optimal estimation algorithm

averaging_kernel_matrix.description: averaging kernel matrix from optimal estimation algorithm

reduced_chi_squared_at_start.description: reduced chi squared statistic at the prior mean state

reduced_chi_squared.description: reduced chi squared statistic at the retrieved state

iterations.description: number of iterations used in optimal estimation algorithm

diverging_steps.description: number of diverging steps (increases in the cost function) made during iteration

cld_quality_flag.description: flag specifying the overall quality of the cloud properties retrieval for each FOV
cld_quality_flag.flag_meanings: [0] best retrieval, [1] good retrieval (retrieval converged but did not meet quality check), [2] retrieval did not converge, [3] retrieval went out of range

cld_qc_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain additional boolean info about the quality of the cloud properties determinations and fields
cld_qc_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] reduced chi^2 is over threshold, [b1] retrieval exceeded iteration limit, [b2] retrieval exceeded divergence limit, [b3] retrieval went out of range, [b4] retrieval solver crashed, [b12] retrieval not attempted due to cloud mask, [b13] retrieval not attempted due to latitude constraint, [b14] retrieval not attempted due to 1B-RAD status

emis_mean.description: average surface emissivity per 1-degree grid box

asc_emis_mean.description: average surface emissivity per 1-degree grid box for ascending granule segments

desc_emis_mean.description: average surface emissivity per 1-degree grid box for descending granule segments

emis_stdev.description: standard deviation of average surface emissivity per 1-degree grid box

asc_emis_stdev.description: standard deviation of average surface emissivity per 1-degree grid box for ascending segments

desc_emis_stdev.description: standard deviation of average surface emissivity per 1-degree grid box for descending segments

emis_count.description: count of total emissivity observations per 1-degree grid box

asc_emis_count.description: count of total emissivity observations per 1-degree grid box for ascending segments

desc_emis_count.description: count of total emissivity observations per 1-degree grid box for descending segments

emis_sumsquares.description: sum of squared emissivities per 1-degree grid box

asc_emis_sumsquares.description: sum of squared emissivities per 1-degree grid box for ascending segments

desc_emis_sumsquares.description: sum of squared emissivities per 1-degree grid box for descending segments

detector_ID.description: unique integer identifier for each TIRS detector

radiance_obsq_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about the quality of the overall radiance observation made by each scene

detector_ID.description: unique integer identifier for each TIRS detector

radiance_obsq_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about the quality of the overall radiance observation made by each scene

cloud_fraction_profile_correlated.description: vertical profile of cloud fraction, adjusted to increase along-track correlation in cloud occurrence

cloud_mask_profile_correlated.description: vertical profile of cloud mask, adjusted to increase along-track correlation in cloud occurrence

qi_profile.description: vertical profile of cloud ice mixing ratio

ql_profile.description: vertical profile of cloud liquid water mixing ratio

cloud_flag.description: flag indicating either the lack of clouds or the dominant phase of any clouds

surf_emis.description: surface emissivity estimate used in data simulation for PCRTM input

wn.description: wavenumber associated with the PCRTM monofrequency input grid for surface emissivity

radiance.description: radiance at full spectral resolution (i.e., PCRTM output using CLARREO 0.5 cm^-1 spectral resolution)

wavenum.description: wavenumber associated with full spectral-resolution radiances

spectral_radiance.description: radiance convolved to TIRS resolution using the specified SRF

wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, given by the SRF-weighted mean over wavelength

idealized_wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, in the idealized spectrometer grid

detector_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about each TIRS channel/scene combination
detector_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] detector masked, [b1] extreme noise or unresponsive detector, [b2] greater-noise category, [b3] unreliable calibration due to stray light contribution, [b4] unreliable calibration due to thermal effects, [b5] unreliable calibration due to filter-edge effects

framecount_caltgt.description: number of frames collected during the calibration target dwell portion of each calibration sequence

framecount_space.description: number of frames collected during the space aperture dwell portion of each calibration sequence

DN_caltgt.description: average adjusted detector digital number (DN) from the calibration target dwell portion of each calibration sequence

DN_space.description: average adjusted detector digital number (DN) from the space aperture dwell portion of each calibration sequence

gain.description: radiometric gain computed from calibration sequence

calseq_engineering_temp.description: engineering temperature of calibration sequence (from TIRS thermistors)

channel_0_DN_caltgt.description: channel 0 average adjusted detector digital number (DN) from the calibration target dwell portion of each calibration sequence

channel_0_DN_space.description: channel 0 average adjusted detector digital number (DN) from the space aperture dwell portion of each calibration sequence

channel_0_gain.description: channel 0 radiometric gain computed from calibration sequence

caltgt_ctime.description: continuous_time at the midpoint of the calibration target dwell portion of each calibration sequence; similar to TAI, and referenced to the epoch 2000-01-01T00:00:00 UTC

space_ctime.description: at the midpoint of the space dwell portion of each calibration sequence; similar to TAI, and referenced to the epoch 2000-01-01T00:00:00 UTC

engineering_temp.description: engineering temperature of the TIRS instrument

scipkt_rel_ctime.description: calibration-input science data frame continuous_time (relative to scipkt_ctime_start_s) at the midpoint of each TIRS image integration; similar to TAI, and referenced to the epoch 2000-01-01T00:00:00 UTC

scipkt_frame_type.description: the determined type of each calibration-input science data frame
scipkt_frame_type.flag_meanings: [0] nominal obstgt, [1] possible obstgt, [10] nominal caltgt (cal-sequence), [11] possible caltgt, [12] nominal caltgt (non-cal-sequence), [13] possible caltgt (payload-on-but-safed), [20] nominal space (cal-sequence), [21] possible space, [22] nominal space (non-cal-sequence), [30] skew based on encoder only, [31] skew based on block frame count 1, [32] skew based on block frame count 2, [33] skew based on encoder + ROIC DN, [34] skew assumed via disposition, [40] hard stop (motor power off), [41] hard stop (motor power-level sentinel), [42] space aperture short scan, [43] power-on artifacts

scipkt_bus_status_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about bus status for each calibration-input science data frame
scipkt_bus_status_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] REFS_ESM is invalid?, [b1] ATT_DET is invalid?, [b2] REFS is invalid?, [b3] bus telemetry gap?, [b4] payload is powered off?

scipkt_bus_events_bitflags.description: integer composed of bit flags that contain boolean info about bus events for each calibration-input science data frame
scipkt_bus_events_bitflags.value_meaning: [b0] ascending pass?, [b1] within moon umbra (eclipse)?, [b2] within Earth umbra (eclipse)?, [b3] radio is transmitting?, [b4] radio is active (rx or tx)?, [b5] within payload-on-but-safed (staring at internal cal target) bus maneuver period (start of bus_macro_44 motor hard stop (MHS) to start of bus_macro_45 MHS)?, [b6] bus slew (unknown)?, [b7] bus slew to radio-contact attitude?, [b8] bus slew to LVLH attitude?, [b9] bus slew to safe attitude?, [b10] bus slew to GPS-zenith-point attitude?, [b11] bus slew due to modeled sun avoidance (MSA)?

mirror_aostart_rel_ctime.description: within the calibration-input science data frame time-series, continuous_time (relative to scipkt_ctime_start_s) at which the corresponding mirror angular offset value is first valid; similar to TAI, and referenced to the epoch 2000-01-01T00:00:00 UTC

mirror_ang_offset.description: within the calibration-input science data frame time-series, the time-dependent component of the angular offset of the pointing mirror (with respect to the nadir aperture boresight)
